---
page_title: "vaultsec_secret Ephemeral Resource - vaultsec"
description: |-
  Ephemeral resource to retrieve or generate a secret from Vault.
---

# vaultsec_secret (Ephemeral Resource)

This ephemeral resource attempts to read a secret from Vault. If the secret exists, it returns the value. If the secret does not exist, it generates a new random password.

## Example Usage

```terraform
ephemeral "vaultsec_secret" "example" {
  mount        = "secret"
  name         = "my/secret"
  password_len = 32
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `mount` (String) Mount path of the KV-v2 secret engine.
- `name` (String) Name of the secret.

### Optional

- `key` (String) Key to retrieve. Defaults to "password".
- `override_special` (String) Special characters for generation.
- `password_len` (Number) Length of generated password.

### Read-Only

- `password` (String, Sensitive) The retrieved or generated password.
- `version` (Number) Version of the secret.
